translations: [内科] 胸膜炎；[内科] 肋膜炎

sentences.sentence: He conked out in November with pleurisy.
sentences.translation: 他患肋膜炎于十一月份死去。

sentences.sentence: Pleurisy can also be one of the signs of some cancers.
sentences.translation: 性胸膜炎也可以是其中一个迹象某些癌症。

sentences.sentence: Objective To assess the role of nutritional support in the treatment of tuberculous pleurisy.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨营养支持在结核性胸膜炎治疗中的价值。
